*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. E. B. Austin to Austin, September 3, 1826. Bastrop. Slavery.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="09-03-1826">3.a Sept 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I have this moment received your letter= I am fully convinced and always have been of the necessity and importance of the *person_mentioned*Baron*/person_mentioned*s Speedy return to the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*—I know his long absence has caused you much uneasiness of mind—But I am sorry you think that your anxiety, is a subject of "mirth and " Ridicule " for me I can assure you it is not, nor ever has been— my object when I have seen you in such low spirits has only been to divert your attention to something else and prevent your absolutely dying with melancholy*/p*
*p*I have concluded to go to *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*first as I have to go by *location_mentioned*Monterrey */location_mentioned*to go to *location_mentioned*San Carlos*/location_mentioned*—owing to the drought—the *location_mentioned*lower Route*/location_mentioned*— If there is any possible way of getting the *person_mentioned*Baron */person_mentioned*off I will do so and bring him on immediately I saw a *person_mentioned*gentleman (Yturri)*/person_mentioned* direct from *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*he says the *person_mentioned*Baron */person_mentioned*is Extremely anxious to return— but thinks he cannot untill *date_mentioned n="12-xx-1826">Decembr */date_mentioned*at any rate I will go and see—*/p*
*p*Try and Keep the *person_mentioned*Slave holders*/person_mentioned* from going until they hear the result of the *person_mentioned*Slave */person_mentioned*question-— Tell them they are safe yet—and there is but little doubt but part of the laws will be favourable—that is—what—relates to the *person_mentioned*Slaves */person_mentioned*already in the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*— The *person_mentioned*Ayuntam */person_mentioned*of this place have made as Warm a Representation in favor of it as you have— Your Representation is thought well of—the attempt to comitt such an outrage on the rights of the *person_mentioned*Settlers*/person_mentioned*—-(they say) perfectly justifies you in expressing your feelings in the strongest terms—they have done the same— You will receive a Copy of the Represenon—they have made this mail— The *person_mentioned*Cabildo*/person_mentioned* are quite Sanguine of obtaining a favorable *person_mentioned*slave */person_mentioned*law— I had a relapse a few days ago—and am so weak can hardly write— I shall start however *date_mentioned n="09-04-1826">to morrow */date_mentioned*in company with what *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*are here— and a *person_mentioned*convoy */person_mentioned*going to *location_mentioned*Laredo*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*Respects to *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned*—sorry to hear he has been in such low health—would write him but have no—time— Remr me to *person_mentioned*Mrs Picket */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Elisa*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. B. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*You may direct your next letter to *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*P. S*person_mentioned*—Martin de Leon*/person_mentioned* has just arrived I do not know the object of his Visit—*/p*
*p*P. S. Do not forget the Turpentine and the Gin—*/p*
*p*I shall see *person_mentioned*D.n Victor*/person_mentioned* and you can write me in *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*if you could make any arrangement to buy—the *location_mentioned*mill*/location_mentioned*—for any thing but Cash I could get the money in *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*or a draft on this place—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. B. A*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
